channel.title: Randoms
channel.description:
Ok, I want the starting stuff to be random. Would the code be something like:
[code] //Giving the player a unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=randomHat: 123, 123, 123; playerEquipment[playerCape]=randomCape: 123, 123, 123; [/code]
Am I right? And the starting position:
[code] // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = randomXCoords: 2332, 2323 teleportToY = randomYCoords: 2332, 2322[/code]
Comeon, help.

item.title: Randoms
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Ok, I want the starting stuff to be random.
Would the code be something like:

//Giving the player a unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=randomHat: 123, 123, 123; playerEquipment[playerCape]=randomCape: 123, 123, 123;

Am I right?
And the starting position:

// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = randomXCoords: 2332, 2323 teleportToY = randomYCoords: 2332, 2322

Comeon, help.
